Verses: 1 avar Erigovil Piravesiththu, Adhin Vazhiyaaga Nadandhupogaiyil,
2 aayakkaararukkuth Thalaivanum Aisuvariyavaanumaayirundha Sageyu Ennappatta Oru Manushan,
3 yesu Eppadippattavaro Endru Avaraip Paarkka Vagaithedinaan. Avan Kullanaanapadiyaal, Janakkoottaththil Avaraik Kaanakkoodaamal,
4 avar Pogum Vazhiyil Munnaaga Odi, Avaraip Paarkkumpadi Oru Kaattaththi Maraththil Erinaan.
5 yesu Andha Idaththil Vandhapodhu, Annaandhupaarththu, Avanaik Kandu: Sageyuve, Nee Seekkiramaai Irangivaa, Indraikku Naan Un Veettile Thangavendum Endraar.
6 avan Seekkiramaai Irangi, Sandhoshaththode Avarai Azhaiththukkondu Ponaan.
7 adhaik Kanda Yaavarum: Ivar Paaviyaana Manushanidaththil Thangumpadiponaar Endru Murumuruththaargal.

8 sageyu Nindru, Karththarai Nokki: Aandavare, En Aasthigalil Paadhiyai Ezhaigalukkuk Kodukkiren, Naan Oruvanidaththil Edhaiyaagilum Aniyaayamaai Vaanginadhundaanaal, Naalaththanaiyaagath Thirumbach Seluththugiren Endraan.
9 yesu Avanai Nokki: Indraikku Indha Veettukku Ratchippu Vandhadhu; Ivanum Aabiragaamukkuk Kumaaranaayirukkiraane.
10 izhandhuponadhaith Thedavum Ratchikkavume Manushakumaaran Vandhirukkiraar Endraar.

11 avargal Ivaigalaik Kettuk Kondirukkaiyil, Avar Erusalemukkuch Sameebiththirundhabadiyinaalum, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Seekkiramaai Velippadumendru Avargal Ninaiththapadiyinaalum, Avar Oru Uvamaiyaich Sonnaar:
12 pirabuvaagiya Oruvan Oru Raajyaththaip Petrukkondu Thirumbi Varumpadi Dhesaththukkup Pogap Purappattaan.

13 purappadumpodhu, Avan Than Oozhiyakkaararil Paththupperai Azhaiththu, Avargalidaththil Paththuraaththal Thiraviyankoduththu: Naan Thirumbivarumalavum Idhaikkondu Viyaabaarampannungal Endru Sonnaan.
14 avanudaiya Ooraar Avanaip Pagaiththu, Ivan Engal Mel Raajaavaayirukkiradhu Engalukku Manadhillaiyendru Sollumpadi Avan Pinne Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppinaargal.

15 avan Raajyaththaip Petrukkondu Thirumbivanthapothu, Thannidaththil Thiraviyam Vaangiyirundha Andha Oozhiyakkaararil Avanavan Viyaabaarampannich Sambaadhiththadhu Ivvalavendru Ariyumpadi, Avargalaith Thannidaththil Azhaiththuvarach Sonnaan.
16 appozhudhu Mundhinavan Vandhu: Aandavane, Ummudaiya Raaththalinaal Paththuraaththal Aadhaayam Kidaiththadhu Endraan.
17 ejamaan Avanai Nokki: Nalladhu Uththama Oozhiyakkaarane, Nee Konjaththil Unmaiyullavanaayirundhapadiyaal Paththup Pattanangalukku Adhigaariyaayiru Endraan.
18 appadiye Irandaam Oozhiyakkaaran Vandhu: Aandavane, Ummudaiya Raaththalinaal Aindhuraaththal Aadhaayam Kidaiththadhu Endraan.
19 avanaiyum Avan Nokki: Neeyum Aindhu Pattanangalukku Adhigaariyaayiru Endraan.
20 pinbu Veroruvan Vandhu: Aandavane, Idho, Ummudaiya Raaththal, Idhai Oru Seelaiyile Vaiththirundhen.
21 neer Vaikkaadhadhai Edukkiravarum, Vidhaikkaadhadhai Arukkiravarumaana Kadinamulla Manushanendru Arindhu, Umakkup Bayandhirundhen Endraan.

22 adharku Avan: Pollaadha Oozhiyakkaarane, Un Vaaichsollaikkonde Unnai Niyaayantheerkkiren. Naan Vaikkaadhadhai Edukkiravanum, Vidhaikkaadhadhai Arukkiravanumaana Kadinamulla Manushanendru Arindhaaye,
23 pinne En Nee En Thiraviyaththaik Kaasukkadaiyile Vaikkavillai; Vaiththirundhaal Naan Varumpodhu, Adhai Vattiyode Varappatrikkolvene Endru Solli;
24 sameebamaai Nirkiravargalai Nokki: Andha Raaththalai Avan Kaiyilirundheduththu, Paththuraaththal Ullavanukkuk Kodungal Endraan.
25 adharku Avargal: Aandavane, Avanukkup Paththuraaththal Irukkiradhe Endraargal.
26 adharku Avan: Ullavan Evanukkung Kodukkappadum, Illaadhavanidaththil Ulladhum Eduththukkollappadum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
27 andriyum Thangalmel Naan Raajaavaagiradharku Manadhillaadhirundhavargalaagiya Ennudaiya Saththurukkalai Inge Konduvandhu, Enakku Munbaaga Vettippodungal Endru Sonnaan Endraar
28 ivaigalai Avar Sonnapinbu Erusalemukkup Purappattu, Mundhinadandhuponaar.
29 avar Olivamalaiyennappatta Malaiyin Arugaana Pedhpage Beththaaniyaa Ennum Oorgalukkuch Sameebiththabodhu, Thammudaiya Seesharil Iranduperai Nokki:

30 ungalukku Edhire Irukkira Giraamaththukkup Pongal, Adhile Piravesikkumpodhu Manushariloruvanum Orukkaalum Eriyiraadha Kazhudhaikkuttiyaik Kattiyirukkak Kaanbeergal, Adhai Avizhththukkondu Vaarungal.
31 adhai En Avizhkkireergalendru Yaaraavadhu Ungalidaththil Kettaal, Adhu Aandavarukku Vendumendru Sollungal Endraar.
32 anuppappattavargal Poi, Thangalukku Avar Sonnapadiye Kandaargal.
33 kazhudhaikkuttiyai Avargal Avizhkkumpodhu, Adharku Udaiyavargal: Kuttiyai En Avizhkkireergal Endru Kettaargal.
34 adharku Avargal: Adhu Aandavarukku Vendumendru Solli,
35 adhai Yesuvinidaththil Konduvandhu, Thangal Vasthirangalai Adhinmelpottu, Yesuvai Adhinmel Etrinaargal.
36 avar Pogaiyil, Avargal Thangal Vasthirangalai Vazhiyile Viriththaargal.
37 avar Olivamalaiyin Adivaaraththukkuch Sameebamaai Varugaiyil Thiralaanakoottamaagiya Seesharellaarum Thaangal Kanda Sagala Arpudhangalaiyunkuriththuch Sandhoshappattu,

38 karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Varugira Raajaa Sthoththirikkappattavar, Paralogaththile Samaadhaanamum Unnadhaththile Magimaiyum Undaavadhaaga Endru Migundha Saththaththode Dhevanaip Pugazhndhaargal.
39 appozhudhu Koottaththilirundha Pariseyaril Silar Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Ummudaiya Seesharai Adhattum Endraargal.
40 avargalukku Avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ivargal Pesaamalirundhaal Kallugale Kooppidum Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
41 avar Sameebamaai Vandhapodhu Nagaraththaippaarththu, Adharkaagak Kanneervittazhudhu,
42 unakkuk Kidaiththa Indha Naalilaagilum Un Samaadhaanaththukku Etravaigalai Nee Arindhirundhaayaanaal Nalamaayirukkum, Ippozhudho Avaigal Un Kangalukku Maraivaayirukkiradhu.
43 unnaich Sandhikkunkaalaththai Nee Ariyaamarponapadiyaal, Un Saththurukkal Unnaich Soozha Mathilpottu, Unnai Valaindhukondu, Eppakkaththilum Unnai Nerukki,
44 unnaiyum Unnilulla Un Pillaigalaiyum Tharaiyaakkippottu, Unnidaththil Oru Kallinmel Oru Kalliraadhapadikkuch Seyyum Naatkal Varum Endraar.
45 pinbu Avar Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Adhile Virkiravargalaiyum Kollugiravargalaiyum Purambe Thuraththaththodangi:
46 ennudaiya Veetu Jebaveedaayirukkiradhendru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu, Neengalo Adhaik Kallarkugaiyaakkineergal Endraar.
47 avar Naadorum Dhevaalayaththil Ubadhesam Pannikkondirundhaar. Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Janaththin Moopparum Avaraik Kolaiseyya Vagaithediyum,
48 janangalellaarum Avarukkuch Sevikoduththu Avarai Andik Kondirundhapadiyaal, Adhai Innapadi Seyyalaamendru Vagaikaanaadhirundhaargal.
